Testing Math Rendering

Exponents

  • x2x^2x2 should have 2 as superscript
  • f(x)=x2+3x−5f(x) = x^2 + 3x - 5f(x)=x2+3x−5
  • e−x2e^{-x^2}e−x2

Derivatives

  • f′(x)=2xf'(x) = 2xf′(x)=2x - the prime should be properly positioned
  • ddx[xn]=nxn−1\frac{d}{dx}[x^n] = nx^{n-1}dxd​[xn]=nxn−1

Limits

  • lim⁡x→0sin⁡xx=1\lim_{x \to 0} \frac{\sin x}{x} = 1limx→0​xsinx​=1 - the subscript should be below lim
  • lim⁡h→0f(x+h)−f(x)h\lim_{h \to 0} \frac{f(x+h) - f(x)}{h}limh→0​hf(x+h)−f(x)​

Display Math

lim⁡x→0sin⁡xx=1\lim_{x \to 0} \frac{\sin x}{x} = 1 x→0lim​xsinx​=1

f′(x)=lim⁡h→0f(x+h)−f(x)hf'(x) = \lim_{h \to 0} \frac{f(x+h) - f(x)}{h} f′(x)=h→0lim​hf(x+h)−f(x)​
